section.title: 9 Patch Drawables
section.para: 9 Patch drawables are Drawables which have a one pixel additional border. On the top and left you define the area which should be scaled if the Drawable is to small for the view. This is the stretch area.

mediaobject.textobject: Defining the 9 patch Drawable stretch area

section.para: On the right and bottom side you define the area where a text should be placed if this Drawable is used on a view which can write text on it, e.g. a Button.
The ADT supplies the draw9patch program in the android-sdk/tools installation folder, which makes it easy to create 9 Patch drawables .
A nice online generator for 9 patch drawables can be found under the following URL: Simple Nine-patch generator .
